post:
We have been providing fully managed hosting solutions with spontaneous round the clock support, for more than 11 years. We use eNlight cloud architecture for our Linux VPS machines. All the plans are equipped with essential features such as Softaculous, Spamassasin, etc…

Our VPS hosting specifications are as follows:

Linux VPS Servers:

VPS Standard

• HDD: 25 GB
• Bandwidth: 600 GB
• RAM: 1.5 GB
• Dedicated IPs: 2
• Price: $29.99/month

VPS Enterprise

• HDD: 45 GB
• Bandwidth: 1 TB
• RAM: 2 GB
• Dedicated IPs: 2
• Price: $49.99/month

VPS Corporate

• HDD: 65 GB
• Bandwidth: 2 TB
• RAM: 2.5 GB
• Dedicated IPs: 2
• Price: $69.99/month

Operating System:
• Linux OS: CentOS / Fedora / Debian / Ubuntu

Control Panels:

• CPanel/WHM with Softaculous: $8.00
• Plesk Web Admin Edition: $3.00
• Plesk Web App Edition: $5.00
• Plesk Web Pro Edition: $7.00
• Plesk Web Host Edition: $14.00
